name: SAHAKARI AVAS PRADYOG (SAP)
briefDescription: Our organisation is working for the overall development of poor mass (482 nos.), disabled (97 nos. of mental retardation & cerebral palsy),  most depressed section community (SC-114 nos.), child care (206 nos.), women through formation of SHGs(22 SHGs), human resources development through teachers training programme (50 nos. per year), vocational training like screen printing & book binding, tailoring & carpentry to the disabled children (36 nos.) and Inclusive Education programme to the disabled children at the Secondary stage (102 nos.).
